attributes.action: create an area in stoke gifford for youths to keep them off the street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i propose an area for teenagers that tend to hang around outside tesco express and the popular rooms to be built within stoke gifford to prevent further tourble occuring.
this will create a safer atmosphere for the older people living in stoke gifford who may not feel safe going to the shops. not only this but its intimidating for people who wish to make cash withdrawels at the shop.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
